synopsis.text: The once overlooked, Kae Serinuma, a dedicated high school otaku and passionate BL enthusiast, finds her world turned upside down following the tragic demise of her beloved anime character. Grief-stricken, she retreats into isolation, inadvertently shedding a significant amount of weight and emerging as an unexpected beauty. Caught in the whirlwind of newfound attention from four admiring boys at her school, Serinuma must navigate this unfamiliar territory while clinging to her cherished BL fantasies. As the pursuit for her affection intensifies, Serinuma can't help but yearn for her suitors to fall for each other instead. How will this delightfully chaotic situation unfold for the transformed fujoshi?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
